title: How I feel as a jungler when my team mates say "gg no ganks"

replies.body:
"Alright this toplane matchup doesn't look amazing, I'd better be there a lot"
*Shows but it's warded so nothing happening*
*Comes back a bit later but the enemy jungler's there too so I gank mid instead*
*Enemy top is farming under tower for 10 minutes (while still somehow zoning my top)*
*Dragon shenagins happen*
*I finally get up there but top's so gone that she dies in the gank and I barely get away*
{{champion:102}} dude I needed help sooner wtf
@_@
I feel this way when I jungle. I don't get chewed out for it, but I still feel bad not being able to share the ganks.
However, I can never get over the rage that happens when you gank constantly pushing immobile top laners.
lies {{champion:102}}  needs no ganks!

Whichever lane bitches the most determines which lane I camp the least.

I gank a shit ton, so there's no reason to bitch to the hand feeding you.

The best is when you're not ganking because you're trying to farm in the jungle, and when you do gank they bitch because you're under-leveled.

This is why I don't jungle.

I feel you, man, I feel you.

"omg noob jungler y u no level 6?"
"Because you ping for help every time I try to get a camp, farm at your tower when I do gank, and wouldn't let me tax even though you killed the enemy laner."
"wtf noob jungle gg report—"
"Do you hear that? Do you hear that sound?"
"What sound, noo—"
"It's the sound of a million fucks crying for help just before they are silenced... and now they're gone."

i was a 4-0-1 wukong ganking for an 0-1 zed a couple games back and the gank went beautifully. i did almost all the damage and let zed last hit the champ and on my way out i last hit the cannon minion that was about to die which allowed me to hit lvl 6 and gank mid for another kill.

**STILL GOT THIS MESSAGE!!!! {{champion:238}} DONT TAKE MY FARM DUDE WTF IS YOUR PROBLEM**

moral of the story... some people are just trash and always will be. rise above

> [{quoted}](name=MrSexyHobo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MnpqZWWA,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-05-06T07:11:29.091+0000)

> 
> **STILL GOT THIS MESSAGE!!!! {{champion:238}} DONT TAKE MY FARM DUDE WTF IS YOUR PROBLEM**
> 
> moral of the story... some people are just trash and always will be. rise above

ryze above*
FTFY.

I hate it when I jungle and laners bitch about me taking the farm. (They were back at base and the wave was at out tower after I just gave them a kill from a gank)

How bitchy laners are is one of the main reasons I rarely play jungle.
As a jungler I feel like  I have to cut myself into three slices and put those slices and three lanes people will still  say that shit

Yeah, if I don't gank, it's because I probably can't gank.

Bot has a ward bot, so that's more or less ungankable, especially if they don't have vision control.
Mid usually clears wave then hides under tower, plus some of the common picks have 50 blinks/dashes.
Top pushes to tower or feeds, sometimes both, which is the makings of a double kill.

Bonus points if all 3 happen at the same time.

As a jungler, all these reasons are why I camp the fuck out of mid if the enemy mid is immobile. Which is why people don't like picking immobile mids.

As a {{champion:101}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:90}} fan, It kinda stings to realize I'm part of the problem.
As a top laner, I do not want my jungler ganking for me 9/10 times.  Go help bot lane before they feed the damn enemy Jinx.

> [{quoted}](name=KnifeLion,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MnpqZWWA,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-05-06T06:52:02.040+0000)
>
> As a top laner, I do not want my jungler ganking for me 9/10 times.  Go help bot lane before they feed the damn enemy Jinx.

Top lane shouldn't really need ganks. Mid can snowball harder

Whenever I lane, I play the lane like I won't get a gank unless the jungler explicitly states he is ganking. 

When I jungle, I expect lanes to know how to handle losing a little. If you can't lose lane without feeding 8 kills, we were going to lose anyway. Very few people seem to understand its okay to be behind ~20 cs and a kill.  You don't have to go mega HAM to try to catch up.

How things are in my ranked elo:

{{champion:55}} Get the fk over here stupid jungler, I'm pushing with no wards and blaming you for getting ganked
{{champion:67}} Scrub jungler doesn't gank even though I'm the one who facetanks all skillshots and keeps trading vs the 3/0 enemy ADC
{{champion:92}}  Yo, get over here dangit! I only fed my lane opponent 3 kills because I tower-dove him 3 times and now he can kill me
{{champion:77}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=WutsKraken,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MnpqZWWA,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-05-06T06:50:53.042+0000)
>
> How things are in my ranked elo:
> 
> {{champion:55}} Get the fk over here stupid jungler, I'm pushing with no wards and blaming you for getting ganked
> {{champion:67}} Scrub jungler doesn't gank even though I'm the one who facetanks all skillshots and keeps trading vs the 3/0 enemy ADC
> {{champion:92}}  Yo, get over here dangit! I only fed my lane opponent 3 kills because I tower-dove him 3 times and now he can kill me
> {{champion:77}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Lmao. No no no. Riven is more like 
Goes 7-0 in lane from getting ganked over and over
Calls jungler over
Let's jungler last hit opponent
Jungler now 5-2-1
Both snowball harder and carry scrub adc and toxic mid.
Lose game anyways

I don't ask that you gank my lane, I just ask that you match their jungler.  Farming junglers, at this point in time, are NOT A THING.  The meta is currently in a position where the best junglers are utility or tank junglers who bring vision, CC, and pressure. If their jungler is applying a ton of pressure, so should you.  Not necessarily my lane, but it should be one of them.  For instance, if top is getting camped and you aren't there to counter, then you should be looking to do dragon and/or wreck bot.  If you're top and their jungler is bot or doing drag, you'd better take that tower.

There's a difference between an enemy jungler who is 6-0 because he's capitalizing on stupidity (not warding, no awareness, over-extending) and an enemy jungler who is 6-0 because he's putting the team on his back, diving towers, and wrecking lanes.

Also there are certain lanes that you should be prioritizing for pressure.  Enemy nasus or vayne?  Sit on them.
...and it's 2 minutes in and you're still doing your first clear.
Bruce Almighty gifs are the best gifs

On the other hand, if you're playing someone like Rek'Sai or Shaco and you aren't ganking a ton, damn straight I'm going to be thinking that. Then there's the times that the enemy jungler is ganking all the lanes, even people standing under their tower, and getting kills all over the place. A lot of the complaining towards junglers is undeserved but there's also those times where you just pull your hair out from what they're doing.

I ping on my way, when I show up the laner stays under tower and keeps farming. Wonders why I took the kill. Or wonders why I don't gank after you've fed 3 kills. I'm not that great of a jungler, but those 3 kills add up to a big item advantage for your enemy laner.

*ganking while top lane sits and farms*
End of laning phase: "Why you no gank for me?"

"gg no ganks"
"well, looks like you're not getting any now"

"But But you're the jungler! Your suppose to win my lane for me so that I don't have to do anything! and then I complain when you get the kills and I go and steal all your jungle camps for the rest of the game." -people
From my personal experience it feels worse to be ignored by ur team (mostly jungler) when u need help than it is to get told gg no ganks.

To be honest, you shouldn't have to rely on ganks to do well in lane. At the very least, you can hold the lane if the matchup is poor and get vision in case of ganks. This helps junglers a LOT more than any complaining will.
That feel when you gank bot lane for a double kill, go and gank mid for a double kill because a failed countergank by the enemy and the top is pinging assistance like you havent done anything.

> [{quoted}](name=SONYM1NG,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=MnpqZWWA,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-05-06T03:57:15.076+0000)
>
> Gotta ignore the people who say that make farm it up and win the game. 
> Unless your playing a early game champ like Lee or Pantheon o-o
> Smite On{{summoner:11}}

I take it English is your second language.
